Functions
Autofill_By_Sample_Type_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.

Load_Sample_Name_To_Dilution_Annot_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The system will copy all RQC samples into the sheet "Dilution_Annot"

Clear_Sample_Table_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.

Autofill_Concentration_Unit_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

If there are some entry in the Sample_Amount_Unit column, the program will use the custom unit section from the ISTD_Annot sheet to create the following concentration units.

Concentration units will be updated if there are some entry in the Sample_Amount_Unit column and the custom unit section from the ISTD_Annot sheet is changed.

Autofill_Sample_Type_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

Any blank cells in the Sample_Type columns with a Sample_Name will be filled with sample type "SPL"

Load_Sample_Annot_Tidy_Column_Name_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.

Load_Sample_Annot_Raw_Column_Name_Click
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.
